SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]を 待[ま]った
SongLyrics.EngStr: I waited for you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]は 待[ま]った
SongLyrics.EngStr: I waited.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 途切[とぎ]れない 明日[あした]も 過[す]ぎて 行[い]って
SongLyrics.EngStr: The endless tomorrow passed by.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 立[た]ち止[ど]まって 振[ふ]り 返[かえ]って
SongLyrics.EngStr: I stopped and looked back.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: とめどない 今日[きょう]を 嘆[なげ]き 合[あ]った
SongLyrics.EngStr: We lamented the endless today.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 記憶[きおく]だって 永遠[とわ]になんて 残[のこ]らないものとおもい 知[し]って
SongLyrics.EngStr: I realized that even memories won't last forever.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]はずっと 掻[か]きむしって 心[こころ]の 隅[すみ]っこで 泣[な]いた
SongLyrics.EngStr: I kept scratching and cried in the corner of my heart.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そして どうか なくさないでよって
SongLyrics.EngStr: And I asked, please don't lose it.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 高[こう]架[か]下[した]、 過[す]ぎる 日々[ひび]を
SongLyrics.EngStr: Under the overpass, the days that passed by.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 後悔[こうかい]してんだよって そう 言[い]い 逃[のが]したあの 日[ひ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: I regretted it, that's what I said and let it slip that day.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 繋[つな]ぎ 合[あ]った 時[とき]もあった
SongLyrics.EngStr: There were times we were connected.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: ほどけない 感情[かんじょう] 持[も]ち 寄[よ]って それが 僕[ぼく]のすべてだった
SongLyrics.EngStr: We brought forth unbreakable emotions, and that was everything to me.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: それもたった 今[いま] 失[な]くしたんだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: But now I've just lost that too.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 形[かたち]だって 時[とき]が 経[た]って 変[か]わり ゆくものとおもい 知[し]って
SongLyrics.EngStr: I realized that even forms will change as time goes by.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]はずっと 掻[か]きむしって 塞[ふさ]がれた 今日[きょう]を 恨[うら]んだ
SongLyrics.EngStr: I kept scratching and cursed the blocked-out today.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: そして どうか なくさないでよって
SongLyrics.EngStr: And I asked, please don't lose it.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 高[こう]架[か]下[した]、 過[す]ぎる 日々[ひび]を
SongLyrics.EngStr: Under the overpass, the days that passed by.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 後悔[こうかい]してんだよって そう 言[い]い 逃[のが]したあの 日[ひ]
SongLyrics.EngStr: I regretted it, that's what I said and let it slip that day.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]を 待[ま]った
SongLyrics.EngStr: I waited for you.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]は 待[ま]った
SongLyrics.EngStr: I waited.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 途切[とぎ]れない 明日[あした]も 過[す]ぎて 行[い]って
SongLyrics.EngStr: The endless tomorrow passed by.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 僕[ぼく]は 今日[きょう]も 掻[か]きむしって 忘[わす]れない 傷[きず]をつけているんだよ
SongLyrics.EngStr: Even today, I'm scratching and leaving a wound that won't be forgotten.

SongLyrics.JpnStr: 君[きみ]じゃないとさ
SongLyrics.EngStr: It has to be you.

ListVocab: 掻きむしる-かきむしる
立ち止まる-たちどまる
